at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player returns a creature they control to its owner's hand
at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player gains control of cardname
at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player may put a plus n plus n counter on target creature of their choice
at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player chooses target player who has more life than they do and is their opponent the first player may have cardname deal n damage to the second player
at the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep that player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker if the player can't they lose n life
at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player chooses a color until end of turn lands tapped for mana produce mana of the chosen color instead of any other color

at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player may choose any number of tapped basecolor creatures they control and pay genericmana for each creature chosen this way if the player does untap those creatures
at the beginning of each player's end step that player draws a card if the player is your opponent and has four or more cards in hand cardname deals n damage to that player
at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player discards a card at random
at the beginning of each player's upkeep if that player controls a plains they gain n life
at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player sacrifices a land
at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player loses n life
at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player sacrifices a basecolor or basecolor permanent
at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player untaps a land they control
at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player discards a card
at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player sacrifices a nonminus zombie creature
at the beginning of each player's upkeep that player sacrifices a nonbasic land
